title: Chat Opening (asking to wait) ETG/B.com UK

cards.content: Hello [Cx Name], my name is [Agent name]. Please give me a moment to review your request.

title: Chat Opening (asking to state the request) ETG/B.com UK

cards.content: Hello [Cx Name], my name is [Agent name]. How may I help you with your booking?.

title: Chat Opening due to long wait time (more than 5 minutes) Request stated ETG/B.com UK
description: The customer has gone through the workflow and is waiting to be connected to the agent

cards.content: Hi [Cx Name], this is [Agent name]. Thank you for your patience as we handle a high volume of requests. I'll review your case details and be with you shortly!

title: Chat Opening after connecting with the chat BOT (but no resolution) ETG UK
description: The customer has gone through our chatbot however his query was not resolved and is now connected to the agent

cards.content: Hi [Cx Name], this is [Agent name] from [Brand] Support. I noticed our chatbot couldn't fully assist you—my apologies for the inconvenience, and thank you for your patience! I'll review your case details and be with you shortly!

title: Order not found (request to spell provider's URL) ETG UK
description: When the customer provides an order number which is related to other OTAs/provider's booking

cards.content: Thanks for providing the order number! It looks like this one isn't from our site. Kindly provide the correct spelling of the email address linked to your confirmation email. If that is unavailable, please spell out the URL [Website Address] where you purchased your ticket.

title: Order not found (potentially booked with another provider) ETG UK
description: When the customer provides a name/site's URL which is related to other OTAs/provider's booking

cards.content: Thanks for sharing your booking reference! It seems the number provided doesn’t match a ticket purchased through our website and may have been purchased elsewhere. If you have another reference number, please provide it now. Otherwise, it's best to reach out directly to the provider. Let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with!
Hello, [Cx Name]! My name is [Agent name]. To assist you, I will need your order number.
Hello, [Cx Name]! My name is [Agent name]. Please give me a moment to review your request.

title: Chat Opening (asking to state the request)

cards.content: Hello, [Cx Name]! My name is [Agent name]. How may I help you with your booking?

title: When the customer doesn't have the order number

cards.content:
To assist you, I need to find your booking first. Please provide one of the following:
E-ticket number:
Booking / airline reference number:
Transaction number / approval code:

We're sorry to inform you that the booking reference does not match a ticket purchased through our website. It appears that your ticket was acquired through another company. If you have any additional questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us again.

title: Chat Opening due to long wait time (more than 5 minutes) Request stated

cards.content: Hi [Cx Name] from [Brand] support, and I'm here to assist you today. Due to the high volume of requests we are receiving, you might have experienced delays. Thank you for your patience and understanding. Please allow me a few minutes to review your case.

title: Chat Opening due to long wait time (more than 5 minutes) Request NOT stated

cards.content: than 5 minutes) Request NOT stated Hi [Cx Name] from [Brand] support, and I'm here to assist you today. Due to the high volume of requests we are receiving, you might have experienced delays. Thank you for your patience and understanding. How may I help you with your booking?
